core_principles: Trust & Transparency: Clean, open layouts with ample whitespace.
Action-Oriented: Green used strictly for primary actions and success states.
Data-First: Dashboards use card-based bento grids for scanability.
Human-Centric: Soft shadows and rounded corners to feel organic, not corporate.

containers.main: max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8

buttons.primary: bg-[#2E7D32] hover:bg-[#1B5E20] text-white font-medium px-6 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-[#E8F5E9] text-[#2E7D32] hover:bg-[#C8E6C9] font-medium px-6 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors
buttons.outline: border-2 border-[#2E7D32] text-[#2E7D32] hover:bg-[#F1F8E9] px-6 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm p-6
cards.interactive: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-[#2E7D32]/30 hover:shadow-md cursor-pointer transition-all

badges.success: bg-green-100 text-green-800 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.pending: bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.neutral: bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

login_hero.alt: Fresh organic vegetables in a wooden crate

charts_and_data.style: Minimal axes, grid lines dashed and light (stroke='#E0E0E0'), tooltips with white bg and shadow-lg.

style.tiles: CartoDB Positron (Light, No Labels) or OpenStreetMap Standard
style.markers: Custom SVG markers (Green for available, Orange for pending).
style.controls: Minimal. Zoom bottom-right. No scale bar.

instructions_to_main_agent: Do NOT use 'create-react-app' default CSS. Use Tailwind utility classes for EVERYTHING.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Authentication pages should use a split-screen layout: Left side form, Right side inspirational image (see image_urls.login_hero).
Dashboards must follow the Bento Grid layout defined in 'layout_strategy'.
Use the specified 'Outfit' font for headers. You may need to import it from Google Fonts in index.css.
For the 'Evaluation Engine', use progress bars and radial charts to visualize scores clearly.
All 'Status' indicators (Pending, Delivered, etc.) must use the badge styles defined in 'components.badges'.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Don't center everything.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #0F172A or similar dark slate.
Glassmorphism is allowed for sticky headers (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80).
Transitions: duration-200 ease-out for hover effects.
